javelin.model.world

Class WorldActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.world.WorldActor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Incursion, Merchant, Squad, WorldPlace

    public abstract class WorldActor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An independent overworld feature. If you're creating a new actor type don't forget to update WorldScreen.getallmapactors()!
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • destroy

        public abstract java.lang.Boolean destroy(Incursion attacker)
        Called when an incursion reaches this actor's location.
        Parameters:
        incursion - Attacking incursion.
        Returns:
        true if this place gets destroyed, false if the Incursion is destroyed or null if neither.
        See Also:
        Incursion#ignoreincursion(Incursion), Incursion.fight(int, int)
